title: Iron halberd

properties.name: description
properties.value: An iron halberd is a halberd made of iron. It can be purchased from the Quartermaster in the Tyras Camp or received as loot from Goraks. Like all halberds, this weapon has an attack range of two squares, making it the only variety of melee weapon that can be used to safespot monsters. Halberds cannot be made with the Smithing skill.

Item ID3192

An iron halberd is a halberd made of iron. It can be purchased from the Quartermaster in the Tyras Camp or received as loot from Goraks. Like all halberds, this weapon has an attack range of two squares, making it the only variety of melee weapon that can be used to safespot monsters. Halberds cannot be made with the Smithing skill.

[[File:Iron halberd detail.png|left|150px]]
An '''iron halberd''' is a [[halberd]] made of [[iron equipment|iron]]. It can be purchased from the [[Quartermaster]] in the [[Tyras Camp]] or received as loot from [[Gorak]]s. Like all halberds, this weapon has an [[attack range]] of two squares, making it the only variety of melee weapon that can be used to [[safespot]] monsters. Halberds '''cannot''' be made with the [[Smithing]] skill.
